pages.text: The Full Moon Talisman grants 10% increased damage for the player during a full moon (Every 8 minecraft days).  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_epic)Epic Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_environment)Force of Environment$(/l).
